text: 19.47 Part 3 seeks to ensure that development does not exacerbate or overload transport networks through trips associated with its uses. Where appropriate, conditions and/or planning obligations will be sought to secure mitigation measures required to make a development acceptable. This is in addition to CIL contributions which fund transport infrastructure improvements on a borough-wide scale. All contributions towards new transport infrastructure improvements must be in accordance with Policy DV5 and the Planning Obligations SPD.
